parameters.name: BusinessId
parameters.description: The workflow ID. You can call the [ListBusiness](~~173945~~) operation to query the workflow ID by name.

parameters.name: ChangeType
parameters.description:
The change type. Valid values:

*   0: addition
*   1: update
*   2: deletion

parameters.name: CommitFrom
parameters.description: The start date for committing. Specify the date in the yyyy-MM-dd format.

parameters.name: CommitTo
parameters.description: The end date (included) for committing. Specify the date in the yyyy-MM-dd format.

parameters.name: CommitUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user who commits the file.

parameters.name: FileIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the files to be queried.

parameters.name: FileType
parameters.description:
The type of the code for the file.

The code for files varies based on the file type. For more information, see [DataWorks nodes](~~600169~~). You can call the [ListFileType](~~212428~~) operation to query the type of the code for the file.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description: The DataWorks workspace ID. You can log on to the [DataWorks console](https://workbench.data.aliyun.com/console) and go to the Workspace page to query the ID.
